title: Development of Student-Centered Learning Design Strategies in Physical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Physical Education Knowledge and Leadership Experience
context.additional_context: Targeting corporate elementary physical education administrators/leaders performing managerial roles

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more SCL strategies to enhance student participation in physical education classes
Learners can apply methods to promote student self-directed learning when designing physical education curricula using digital tools
Learners can develop SCL models applicable to real educational settings through project-based assessment

resources: Online Collaboration Tools (Miro, Google Workspace, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
